titleStmt.title: Most godly prayers compiled out of Dauids Psalmes by D. Peter Martyr. Translated out of Latine into English by Charles Glemhan. G. Seene and allowed according to the order appointed
Preces sacrae ex psalmis Davidis desumptae. English
titleStmt.author: Vermigli, Pietro Martire, 1499-1562.
Glemhan, Charles.
Simmler, Josias, 1530-1576.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Charles Glemhan, of the Josias Simmler edition of: Vermigli, Pietro Martire. Preces sacrae ex psalmis Davidis desumptae.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
